mapper.select: select a.id id, a.code code, a.upload_date_time uploadDateTime, a.pull_date_time pullDateTime, b.order_no finishedOrderNo, c.order_no semiFinishedOrderNo, a.CRIB_CODE cribCode, a.CRIB_DATE_TIME cribDateTime from record_box_code a inner join production_order b on a.finished_product_order_id = b.id inner join production_order c on a.semi_finished_product_order_id = c.id where a.code = #{code}
